captions.text:
Do you know me? 
Have we met before?
I just can't remember

If you can't remember,
it probably didn't mean much

Are you listening to my
Sad monologue

Those words that 
Are blaming you, you

That name that hurts
When I call out
You you you

If you sometimes smile
Thinking about me

I won’t have 
any more regrets

So don’t forget 
about me,me

Please remember me, me
There is only one farewell

Why are there so 
much loneliness

I never once forgot
I love you

Is that so, are 
you fine without me
You you you

I am leaving without 
A promise

You are still within me
Don’t forget about me
Me me

Please remember me, me
There is only one farewell

Why are there 
so much loneliness
I never once forgot

I’m not asking you 
To love me again
Just remember my love

Don’t foreget me 
Me, me

Love me
Me,me

There is only 
one farewell

Why are there 
so much loneliness

I never once forgot
I love you

If I remember, can
I put a meaning to it?
I love you
